org.apache.flink.api.common

类 PlanExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.PlanExecutor
  • 直接已知子类:
    LocalExecutor, RemoteExecutor

    @Internal
public abstract class PlanExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    A PlanExecutor executes a Flink program's dataflow plan. All Flink programs are translated to dataflow plans prior to execution.

    The specific implementation (such as the org.apache.flink.client.LocalExecutor and org.apache.flink.client.RemoteExecutor) determines where and how to run the dataflow. The concrete implementations of the executors are loaded dynamically, because they depend on the full set of all runtime classes.

    PlanExecutors can be started explicitly, in which case they keep running until stopped. If a program is submitted to a plan executor that is not running, it will start up for that program, and shut down afterwards.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setPrintStatusDuringExecution

        public void setPrintStatusDuringExecution(boolean printStatus)
        Sets whether the executor should print progress results to "standard out" (System.out). All progress messages are logged using the configured logging framework independent of the value set here.
        参数:
        printStatus - True, to print progress updates to standard out, false to not do that.

      • isPrintingStatusDuringExecution

        public boolean isPrintingStatusDuringExecution()
        Gets whether the executor prints progress results to "standard out" (System.out).
        返回:
        True, if the executor prints progress messages to standard out, false if not.

      • start

        public abstract void start()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts the program executor. After the executor has been started, it will keep running until stop() is called.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the executor startup failed.

      • stop

        public abstract void stop()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Shuts down the plan executor and releases all local resources.

        This method also ends all sessions created by this executor. Remote job executions may complete, but the session is not kept alive after that.

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the proper shutdown failed.

      • isRunning

        public abstract boolean isRunning()
        Checks if this executor is currently running.
        返回:
        True is the executor is running, false otherwise.

      • executePlan

        public abstract JobExecutionResult executePlan(Plan plan)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute the given program.

        If the executor has not been started before, then this method will start the executor and stop it after the execution has completed. This implies that one needs to explicitly start the executor for all programs where multiple dataflow parts depend on each other. Otherwise, the previous parts will no longer be available, because the executor immediately shut down after the execution.

        参数:
        plan - The plan of the program to execute.
        返回:
        The execution result, containing for example the net runtime of the program, and the accumulators.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if job submission caused an exception.

      • getOptimizerPlanAsJSON

        public abstract java.lang.String getOptimizerPlanAsJSON(Plan plan)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the programs execution plan in a JSON format.
        参数:
        plan - The program to get the execution plan for.
        返回:
        The execution plan, as a JSON string.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the executor could not connect to the compiler.

      • endSession

        public abstract void endSession(JobID jobID)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Ends the job session, identified by the given JobID. Jobs can be kept around as sessions, if a session timeout is specified. Keeping Jobs as sessions allows users to incrementally add new operations to their dataflow, that refer to previous intermediate results of the dataflow.
        参数:
        jobID - The JobID identifying the job session.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the message to finish the session cannot be delivered.

      • createLocalExecutor

        public static PlanExecutor createLocalExecutor(Configuration configuration)
        Creates an executor that runs the plan locally in a multi-threaded environment.
        返回:
        A local executor.

      • createRemoteExecutor

        public static PlanExecutor createRemoteExecutor(java.lang.String hostname,
                                                int port,
                                                Configuration clientConfiguration,
                                                java.util.List<java.net.URL> jarFiles,
                                                java.util.List<java.net.URL> globalClasspaths)
        Creates an executor that runs the plan on a remote environment. The remote executor is typically used to send the program to a cluster for execution.
        参数:
        hostname - The address of the JobManager to send the program to.
        port - The port of the JobManager to send the program to.
        clientConfiguration - The configuration for the client (Akka, default.parallelism).
        jarFiles - A list of jar files that contain the user-defined function (UDF) classes and all classes used from within the UDFs.
        globalClasspaths - A list of URLs that are added to the classpath of each user code classloader of the program. Paths must specify a protocol (e.g. file://) and be accessible on all nodes.
        返回:
        A remote executor.

      • loadExecutorClass

        private static java.lang.Class<? extends PlanExecutor> loadExecutorClass(java.lang.String className)
